name: SOLING 50 (RC MODEL)
notes:
The SOLING 50 is sanctioned by the national American Model Yacht Association and has very active fleets racing in California, Florida, Michigan and Texas.

Current builders (2012):
Ludwig Mfg., Universal City, TX (http://www.ludwigrcyachts.com)
GRP Model Yachts, Freedom, CA (http://modelyachting.com/)
Hartman Model Boats, Bergen, NY (http://www.hartmanmodelboats.com/)
